page.title: 03LIFE AT LOCH AVICH
page.content: I live on the banks of Loch Avich.Both my mum and dad work on our farm.We have sheep and a few cows.I like spring because of the lambs.The Loch is 5 miles long.There are 9 people living in the 12km block and 3 other people along the Loch.Our land lords come up 3_5 times a year.They stay at Loch Avich house.We have (at the moment) 10 dogs and 2 pups.7 of the 10 dogs are sheep dogs.We don't grow crops and are mainly a hill farm and we have about 20 acres of low ground. In the spring we have the sheep lambing and in the spring and later on into early summer we have the lamb marking.We clip the sheep and dip them in summer and dip them again in Autunm.In the winter we put the tups (rams) out for tupping.
